name: ConstrainBooleanParameters
description: The ConstrainBoolean dictionary is used to specify a constraint for a property whose value is a Boolean value. You can specify an exact value which must be matched, an ideal value that should be matched if at all possible, and a fallback value to attempt to match once all more specific constraints have been applied.

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'ConstrainBoolean' in the 'Media Capture and Streams' specification.
